verses.text: And it came to pass in the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the twelfth \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add that\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w* for \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thou art \w like|strong="H1819"\w* a young \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and thou \add art\add* as a \w whale|strong="H8577"\w* in the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*: and thou camest \w forth|strong="H1518"\w* with thy \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*, and \w troubledst|strong="H1804"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* with thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w fouledst|strong="H7515"\w* their \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*.\f + \fr 32.2 \ft whale: or, dragon\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will therefore spread \w out|strong="H6566"\w* my \w net|strong="H7568"\w* over thee with a \w company|strong="H6951"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and they shall bring thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* in my \w net|strong="H2764"\w*.

Then will I \w leave|strong="H5203"\w* thee upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, I will cast thee \w forth|strong="H2904"\w* upon the \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and will cause all the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* to \w remain|strong="H7931"\w* upon thee, and I will \w fill|strong="H7646"\w* the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* with thee.

And I will \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* the \w valleys|strong="H1516"\w* with thy \w height|strong="H7419"\w*.

I will also \w water|strong="H8248"\w* with thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* wherein thou \w swimmest|strong="H6824"\w*, \add even\add* to the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*; and the \w rivers|strong="H0650"\w* shall be \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of thee.\f + \fr 32.6 \ft the land wherein…: or, the land of thy swimming\f*

And when I shall put thee \w out|strong="H3518"\w*, I will \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w make|strong="H6937"\w* the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* thereof \w dark|strong="H6937"\w*; I will \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* with a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* shall not \w give|strong="H0215"\w* her \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.\f + \fr 32.7 \ft put…: or, extinguish thee\f*

All the \w bright|strong="H3974"\w* \w lights|strong="H0216"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* will I make \w dark|strong="H6937"\w* over thee, and \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* upon thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 32.8 \ft bright…: Heb. lights of the light in heaven\f*\f + \fr 32.8 \ft dark: Heb. them dark\f*

I will also \w vex|strong="H3707"\w* the \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, when I shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, into the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* which thou hast not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*.\f + \fr 32.9 \ft vex: Heb. provoke to anger, or, grief\f*

Yea, I will make \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w amazed|strong="H8074"\w* at thee, and their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* shall be \w horribly|strong="H8178"\w* \w afraid|strong="H8175"\w* for thee, when I shall \w brandish|strong="H5774"\w* my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* before \w them|strong="H6440"\w*; and they shall \w tremble|strong="H2729"\w* at \add every\add* \w moment|strong="H7281"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* for his own \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w fall|strong="H4658"\w*.

¶ For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; The \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon thee.

By the \w swords|strong="H2719"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* will I cause thy \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* to \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, the \w terrible|strong="H6184"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, all of them: and they shall \w spoil|strong="H7703"\w* the \w pomp|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and all the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* thereof shall be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*.

I will \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* also all the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* thereof \w from|strong="H5921"\w* beside the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*; neither shall the \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w trouble|strong="H1804"\w* them any more, nor the \w hoofs|strong="H6541"\w* of \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w trouble|strong="H1804"\w* them.

Then will I make their \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w deep|strong="H8257"\w*, and cause their \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* to \w run|strong="H3212"\w* like \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

When I shall \w make|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, and the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w destitute|strong="H8074"\w* of that whereof it was \w full|strong="H4393"\w*, when I shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* all them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein, then shall they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 32.15 \ft destitute…: Heb. desolate from the fulness thereof\f*

This \add is\add* the \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w* wherewith they shall \w lament|strong="H6969"\w* her: the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w lament|strong="H6969"\w* her: they shall \w lament|strong="H6969"\w* for her, \add even\add* for \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and for all her \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ It came to pass also in the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add that\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w wail|strong="H5091"\w* for the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and cast them \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \add even\add* her, and the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of the \w famous|strong="H0117"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, unto the nether \w parts|strong="H8482"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, with them that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*.
Whom dost thou pass in \w beauty|strong="H5276"\w*? go \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and be thou \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* with the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*.

They shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \add them that are\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: she is \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: \w draw|strong="H4900"\w* her and all her \w multitudes|strong="H1995"\w*.\f + \fr 32.20 \ft she…: or, the sword is laid\f*

The \w strong|strong="H0410"\w* among the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* to him out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w hell|strong="H7585"\w* with them that \w help|strong="H5826"\w* him: they are gone \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, they \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*, \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w Asshur|strong="H0804"\w* \add is\add* there and all her \w company|strong="H6951"\w*: his \w graves|strong="H6913"\w* \add are\add* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him: all of them \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*:

Whose \w graves|strong="H6913"\w* are \w set|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, and her \w company|strong="H6951"\w* is round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* her \w grave|strong="H6900"\w*: all of them \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, which \w caused|strong="H5414"\w* \w terror|strong="H2851"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.\f + \fr 32.23 \ft terror: or, dismaying\f*

There \add is\add* \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w* and all her \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* her \w grave|strong="H6900"\w*, all of them \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, which are gone \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* into the nether \w parts|strong="H8482"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, which \w caused|strong="H5414"\w* their \w terror|strong="H2851"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*; yet have they \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* their \w shame|strong="H3639"\w* with them that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*.

They have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* her a \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* with all her \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*: her \w graves|strong="H6913"\w* \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him: all of them \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*, \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: though their \w terror|strong="H2851"\w* was \w caused|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*, yet have they \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* their \w shame|strong="H3639"\w* with them that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*: he is \w put|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \add them that be\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*.

There \add is\add* \w Meshech|strong="H4902"\w*, \w Tubal|strong="H8422"\w*, and all her \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*: her \w graves|strong="H6913"\w* \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him: all of them \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*, \w slain|strong="H2490"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, though they \w caused|strong="H5414"\w* their \w terror|strong="H2851"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.

And they shall not \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \add that are\add* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* of the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*, which are gone \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w hell|strong="H7585"\w* with their \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*: and they have \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* their \w swords|strong="H2719"\w* under their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, but their \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* shall be upon their \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, though \add they were\add* the \w terror|strong="H2851"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.\f + \fr 32.27 \ft with their…: Heb. with weapons of their war\f*

Yea, thou shalt be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*, and shalt \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with \add them that are\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

There \add is\add* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, her \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, and all her \w princes|strong="H5387"\w*, which with their \w might|strong="H1369"\w* are \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* by \add them that were\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: they shall \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*, and with them that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*.\f + \fr 32.29 \ft laid: Heb. given, or, put\f*

There \add be\add* the \w princes|strong="H5257"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, all of them, and all the \w Zidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, which are gone \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*; with their \w terror|strong="H2851"\w* they are \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* of their \w might|strong="H1369"\w*; and they \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* with \add them that be\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* their \w shame|strong="H3639"\w* with them that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*.

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* them, and shall be \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* over all his \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*, \add even\add* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* and all his \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

For I have \w caused|strong="H5414"\w* my \w terror|strong="H2851"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*: and he shall be \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* with \add them that are\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \add even\add* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* and all his \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
